w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Localized templates
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use one Ui template per locale!
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Basic usage
w:HTMLPanel.p: Instead of using Constants to translate your application, you can use one template per locale. It allows you to change the Ui between locales. It makes also easier to maintain some translations.
However you can still use the GWT Constants in your locale based templates.

To use the localised templates, suffix the template name with the locale. If no one is found for the locale, the default one is used (without suffix) : It follow the same rules as the constants i18n functionnality.
